title: Watch how this housewife goes from Janna to Fizz in once simple trick. :P

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Anyone else notice this? :P
The hair colour in the client is different to the actual page.

replies.body: Isnt it obvious its a teaser for a new ultimate color changing skin like lux's

When did you get purple?

WEVE BEEN ACTIVE FOR THE SAME AMOUNT OF TIME WHY AINT I PURPLE.

Sads.
I dont know what to say D:

Like, we have both been active since the old forums, we've been active for the same amount of time :( 

Mind you, I'm still not blue (Instructor) even tho I'm pretty sure I started that helping trend XD
Im sure you'll get blue, Just keep up giving advice and helping, and be positive, and you're bound to ^^

Is there a colour that they give players who are asshles?

Like not necessarily summoners-code breakers... but those with a fresher, more skeptical perspective on life...

> [{quoted}](name=Neosinf,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qNhGE8wL,comment-id=00010002000000010000,timestamp=2017-01-14T23:15:12.069+0000)
>
> Is there a colour that they give players who are asshles?
> 
> Like not necessary summoners-code breakers... but those with a fresher, more skeptical perspective on life...
> 
> I reported your comment by the way for being really... nice... eek

Yeah dude Im trying to get "Asshole Orange" right now

Hahaha you quoted my comment before i could edit out my asshle statement

I am trying to reform

But maybe i should just embrace it

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qNhGE8wL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-13T12:43:45.552+0000)
>
> When did you get purple?
> 
> WEVE BEEN ACTIVE FOR THE SAME AMOUNT OF TIME WHY AINT I PURPLE.
> 
> Sads.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/5jFAh6QN5Uk/maxresdefault.jpg

They are the same now, y u go ruin the fun 4 us.

These would be interesting as actual skins though. Sejuani riding a mini platypus thingy, female humanoid fizz. 11/10 would buy DeskJock Braum. Sassy short shorts ashe. And team pink human soccer playa poppy!? or is that... Old taric...

I must agree, those would be some pretty fun skins! xD

Pocahontas Ashe :P
I guess she changed her mind about the bleached look :O

A good costume quick-fix while in the field! _(many cosplayers know these waters)_

New Fizz Chroma? Good thinking 99! :P
